entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
